languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g} Паскаля трескуче шипит:{/n} "Это богохульство. Катехизис эксплуатации и обслуживания категорически запрещает столь святотатственное обращение с реликвией".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g} Паскаля трескуче шипит:{/n} "Это богохульство. Катехизис эксплуатации и обслуживания категорически запрещает столь святотатственное обращение с реликвией".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出噼里啪啦的嘶嘶声：{/n}“这是异端行为。操作与维护相关的教义明确禁止用这种亵渎性的方式处理圣遗物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出噼里啪啦的嘶嘶声：{/n}“这是异端行为。操作与维护相关的教义明确禁止用这种亵渎性的方式处理圣遗物。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}がパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「これは異端です。整備と操作の要理は、このような遺物の冒涜的な扱いを断固として禁じております」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}がパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「これは異端です。任務の要理は、このような遺物の冒涜的な扱いを断固として禁じております」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} gibt ein knisterndes Zischen von sich:{/n} "Das ist Ketzerei. Der Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung verbietet kategorisch derartig gotteslästerlichen Umgang mit Relikten."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} gibt ein knisterndes Zischen von sich:{/n} "Das ist Ketzerei. Der Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung verbietet kategorisch derartig gotteslästerlichen Umgang mit Relikten."

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} de Pasqal émet un sifflement crépitant :{/n} « C'est de l'hérésie. Le Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance proscrit explicitement un tel traitement sacrilège des reliques. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} de Pasqal émet un sifflement crépitant :{/n} « C'est de l'hérésie. Le Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance proscrit explicitement un tel traitement sacrilège des reliques. »

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} de Pasqal emite un siseo restallante:{/n} «Esto es herejía. El Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento prohíbe categóricamente esta utilización sacrílega de las reliquias».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

traits.locale_text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} de Pasqal emite un siseo restallante:{/n} «Esto es herejía. El Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento prohíbe categóricamente esta utilización sacrílega de las reliquias».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} çatırdayan bir tıslama çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu küfre girer. Bakım ve Faaliyet İlmihâli, yadigârlara böylesi hürmetsizliği kati surette yasaklar."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} emits a crackling hiss:{/n} "This is heresy. The Catechism of Maintenance and Operation categorically prohibits such sacrilegious handling of relics."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} çatırdayan bir tıslama çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu küfre girer. Bakım ve Faaliyet İlmihâli, yadigârlara böylesi saygısızca muameleyi kati surette yasaklar."
